definition: copper (chemistry)/see also 紅銅|红铜[hong2 tong2]/CL:塊|块[kuai4]
bronze implement/refers to ancient bronze artifacts, from c. 2,000 BC
the Bronze Age/also written 青銅時代|青铜时代[Qing1 tong2 Shi2 dai4]

sentences.english: Dragon pattern is the main manifestation of ornamentations on bronze in the period of Shang to early western Zhou.
sentences.chinese: 龙纹是商周时期青铜器装饰艺术的一大主题。

sentences.english: Yep, going right back to the Bronze Age.
sentences.chinese: 没错，可以直接追溯至铜器时代。

sentences.english: The motifs are classic Chinese ones that are variations on themes that go all the way back to Zhou dynasty bronzes .
sentences.chinese: 图案是典型的中国式，以周朝青铜器上的图案为远祖。

sentences.english: People in the Bronze Age generally used copper to make all kinds of tools.
sentences.chinese: 铜器时代的人们普遍用铜来制造各种工具。

sentences.english: The more alkaline of the soil is, the more serious corrosion on the bronze.
sentences.chinese: 偏碱性土壤中，碱性越强对青铜器的腐蚀越严重。

sentences.english: One drop of Lemon essential oil on a soft cloth will polish copper with a gentle buffing .
sentences.chinese: 用加了一滴柠檬油的软布轻轻擦拭铜器可以为它抛光。

sentences.english: The brasses need to be cleaned.
Simple and plain bronze locks appeared in the Bronze Age.
sentences.chinese: 简单的铜锁出现于青铜器时代。

sentences.english: She polished the brass till it shone brightly.
sentences.chinese: 她擦拭那件铜器，直到它闪闪发光。

sentences.english: These old pieces of brass have polished up beautifully.
sentences.chinese: 这几件古铜器被擦得洗亮夺目。

sentences.english: The first part At the Jin Dynasty JinHou bronze of graveyard the summaries of inscription.
sentences.chinese: 第一部分是对晋侯墓地铜器铭文的概述。

sentences.english: The Simuwu Great Tripod is China's biggest piece of bronze ware.
sentences.chinese: 我国最大的青铜器是司母戊大方鼎。

sentences.english: The Simuwu Rectangle Ding is China's biggest piece of bronze ware.
sentences.chinese: 我国最大的青铜器是司母戊大方鼎。

sentences.english: During the Goryeo period the use of bronze was advanced.
sentences.chinese: 在高丽王朝，青铜器的使用得到推广进步。

sentences.english: The research on pictorial bronzes of Eastern Zhou is a major subject of study on art history and archeology.
sentences.chinese: 东周画像铜器是美术史和考古学研究的重要课题。

sentences.english: Deciphering the Inscriptions on the bronze ware with the help of their variant forms is a method worthy of our attention.
sentences.chinese: 利用异文去校读铜器铭文，是一种值得重视的方法。

definition: bronze implement/refers to ancient bronze artifacts, from c. 2,000 BC
to dig up/to appear in an excavation/unearthed/to come up out of the ground
a pottery figurine buried with the dead
item made from woven silk or rayon
